name: Warrior's Helm
description: A sturdy helm worn by warriors for protection in battle.
looks: The helm is made of thick steel with a faceplate that covers the entire front of the head. It has a crest at the top and a sturdy strap to keep it in place.

name: Enchanted Sword
description: A magical sword imbued with powerful enchantments.
looks: The sword has a shining silver blade with intricate runes etched into its surface. The hilt is made of polished ebony and adorned with a sparkling gemstone.

special_effects.elemental_damage: Adds additional fire damage to attacks

name: Enchanted Sword
description: A magical sword imbued with powerful enchantments.
looks: The sword has a shining silver blade with intricate runes etched into its surface. The hilt is made of polished ebony and adorned with a sparkling gemstone.

special_effects.elemental_damage: Adds additional fire damage to attacks

name: Dagger of Shadows
description: A deadly weapon that can strike unnoticed in the shadows.
looks: The dagger has a black blade that seems to absorb light. Its hilt is wrapped in dark leather and adorned with a small ruby.

special_effects.shadow_strike: Allows the wielder to become temporarily invisible upon a successful hit.

name: Battle Axe
description: A large and heavy two-handed axe with a long handle and a sharp blade.
looks: The battle axe has a wooden handle with leather wrappings for grip. The blade is made of steel and is quite sharp.

special_effects.heavy_swing: Allows for a powerful overhead swing that deals additional damage.

name: Enchanted Sword
description: A magical sword imbued with powerful enchantments.
looks: The sword has a shining silver blade with intricate runes etched into its surface. The hilt is made of polished ebony and adorned with a sparkling gemstone.

special_effects.elemental_damage: Adds additional fire damage to attacks

name: Rusty Sword
description: An old and worn-out sword with a rusty blade.
looks: The sword has a dull blade with patches of rust covering its surface. The hilt is cracked and the leather grip is worn out.

name: Staff of Thunder
description: A mystical staff that channels the power of thunder and lightning.
looks: The staff is crafted from a lightning-struck oak tree and crackles with electricity. It has intricate engravings depicting storms and thunderclouds.

special_effects.electrify: Attacks have a chance to electrify the target, dealing additional lightning damage over time.

name: Dragonblade
description: A legendary sword crafted from the scales of a dragon.
looks: The Dragonblade has a long, silver blade with a serrated edge that glimmers with an iridescent sheen. The hilt is made of dragon scales, giving it a unique and intimidating appearance.

special_effects.Dragon's Wrath: 30% chance to unleash a powerful fire and dark attack upon successful hit.
